name: 更新主脚本
on:
  workflow_dispatch:
  schedule:
    - cron: '30 21 * * *'  # 每天的8点、16点执行（UTC时间）

permissions:
  contents: write

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: 检出代码仓库
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Check PROXYIP_URL variable
        run: |
          # 检查是否设置了PROXIP_URL变量
          PROXIP_URL="${{ vars.PROXIP_URL }}"
          if [ -z "$PROXIP_URL" ]; then
            echo "❌ 错误: 未设置 PROXIP_URL 变量"
            echo "请在仓库设置中添加 PROXIP_URL 变量："
            echo "1. 进入仓库 Settings > Secrets and variables > Actions"
            echo "2. 在 Variables 标签页中添加新变量"
            echo "3. Name: PROXIP_URL"
            echo "4. Value: 脚本的URL地址"
            exit 1
          fi
          echo "✅ PROXIP_URL 变量已设置: $PROXIP_URL"

      - name: Check URL status
        id: check_url
        run: |
          STATUS_CODE=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" "${{ vars.PROXIP_URL }}")
          echo "Status code: $STATUS_CODE"
          if [ "$STATUS_CODE" = "200" ]; then
            echo "url_status_ok=true" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
            echo "URL 响应正常，状态码为 200"
          else
            echo "url_status_ok=false" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
            echo "URL 响应异常，状态码为 $STATUS_CODE，将跳过后续步骤"
          fi
      
      - name: Download
        run: |
          curl -L "${{ vars.PROXIP_URL }}" -o proxyip.txt

      - name: 提交更新的主脚本文件
        run: |
          git config --local user.email "action@github.com"
          git config --local user.name "GitHub Action"
          
          # 检查文件是否有变化
          if [ ! -f proxyip.txt ] || [ ! -s proxyip.txt ]; then
            echo "proxyip.txt 文件不存在或为空，跳过提交"
            exit 0
          fi
          
          if git diff --quiet proxyip.txt 2>/dev/null; then
            echo "proxyip.txt 文件没有变化，跳过提交"
          else
            echo "检测到 proxyip.txt 文件有变化，开始提交"
            git add proxyip.txt
            git commit -m "更新主脚本文件 $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"
            git push
            echo "提交完成"
          fi
